writer.name: 托马斯·谢伊松 Thomas Cheysson

this_title: The Temptation of Saint Anthony: c. 1501
introduction: The temptation of Saint Anthony explores the uncanny creativity of Hieronymus Bosch. The 360° experience transforms his triptych in an animated space and allows us to dive into one of the masterpieces of this undeniable genius from middle age.
chinese_title: The Temptation of Saint Anthony: c. 1501
